transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello haji.
Customer: Hello. Hello good good afternoon sir Shubham baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Bataye sir aapka concern aaya tha hamare paas ki aapko koi dikkat aa rahi hai matlab aapka kaun IndiaMART bol rahe ho.
Executive: Senior manager baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Ha sir mujhe ye kuch nayi inquiry aa rahi hai kuch bhi jyada barabar.
Customer: Aur jaise jaise ja raha hai waise koi work koi mil nahi raha hai jis vajah se aap aap logo ne mujhe star wala dilwaya.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Pehle normal wala tha uske baad star wala dilwaya us usme bhi kiya to fir aap logo ko kuch to update dena chahiye na ki chalo ha 10 15 saal ki regular inquiry aa rahi hai.
Executive: Okay. But aapne star aapne to TrustSeal liya hai sir na star thodi liya hai.
Customer: TrustSeal ki baat kar raha hu TrustSeal dilwaye dilwa diya.
Customer: Ha TrustSeal dilwaya.
Customer: Jo bhi hota hai wo aap dilwate jate ho but uski taraf kuch to hona chahiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi aisa nahi hai TrustSeal aap check karo kitna paanch se 10 inquiry bhi nahi de pa rahe ho kitni inquiry aa rahi hai pure din ki.
Executive: Theek hai mai mai mai bata deta hu check karke aapko kitna aa raha hai mahine ka kitna aa raha hai aur.
Customer: Aur nahi koi manager kuch update le raha hai koi nahi hai mai to manager rakha tha jo sign ho aapko jo kare.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Har mahine ki jo inquiry aa rahi hai aapko 140 aa rahi hai har mahine ka 140.
Customer: 140 aur aage pehle kitni aati thi wo dekho.
Executive: Ye sirf inquiry se hai ye sirf inquiry se hai by lead to aap alag consume kar rahe ho.
Customer: By lead aap alag consume kar rahe ho.
Customer: Aap wo bhi check karo.
Executive: Ha bata raha hu sir.
Executive: Aapka inquiry ka agar mai dekhu to.
Executive: Ab aap jaise last six month se dekhe to nahi six month se dekhe to aapko har mahine ki 500 inquiries aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ha 500 hai na 500 500 aati thi aapko.
Customer: Is time pe abhi tak jo aayi hai aapko 205 aayi hai 205 aayi hai.
Customer: Ha itna kam hai wo dekha na 50% ratio.
Executive: Ha to but abhi sir ye ha matlab thoda sa is mahine ka aapka kam ho gaya hai sir is mahine thoda sa inquiry slow kar diya.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo to dikkat hai is tarah to is tarah jo inquiry aa rahi hai aise baat mat karo ki hum bhi invest karke baithe hote hai sara product wagera hai aap log ko salary mil jati hai to aapko aisa lagta hai sab chal rahe hai aise bolte hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai sir matlab hame.
Customer: Kuch socho aur tumhara jo TrustSeal ka liye humko usme work karke batao ki ha jo tumne humko 200 aaya tha inquiry ab chalo 500 aa gaya wapis ab sahi ho gaya aisa kuch work karke to dikhao.
Executive: Theek hai bilkul bilkul to mai aisa karta hu dekho mai aise karta hu ki team jo inquiry Shubham Singh sir Shubham Singh.
Customer: Shubham Singh mai aapka personally number dena hai to wo do aur har roj update karo.
Executive: Save karo save karo save karo 7827.
Customer: 7827 to hi hi likh kar whatsapp kar do.
Executive: Theek hai mai wo whatsapp bhi kar dunga hai na mujhe update do ki ha sir ye dekho 200 se 500 karke diya.
Executive: Ha mai karta hu sir mujhe bas thodi si ye cheeze puchni hai jaise ki categories hai.
Executive: Hai na jaise ki na jaise aapka jaise mai dekh raha hu aapne crystal condom washable dala hua hai theek hai.
Customer: Ha wagera sab hai ha wo.
Executive: Theek hai dala hai lekin isme kya kar raha hai ki aapne jo dala hua hai na wo category dali hui hai condom ki.
Executive: To jo agar aap condom ki daloge to isme aapko inquiry flow jo aayega wo condom ka aayega jo medical store pe milta hai but aapka product wo nahi hai aapka dusra hai.
Executive: To isme na mai aapko kuch photos bhej raha hu pehle kuch categories ki photos bhejunga to aap mujhe usko tick out karke.
Customer: Aap jo bhi kehna chahenge wo keyword dalwa dunga.
Customer: To aap bologe wo kar dunga.
Executive: Wahi ha wahi isliye bol raha hu kyuki jo aapke paas jo inquiry flow aata hai aapko bhi pata hai ki keyword ke base pe aata hai ki jo keyword aapne dala hua hai uske basis pe aap search karoge to wo aapke paas aayega to wo mai aapko abhi whatsapp pe share kar raha hu apne number se taki aap mujhe wo tick karke do mai aapko wo categories sari add karu aapke ispe catalog me to dheere dheere aapka inquiry flow badhega aisa nahi hai mai saaf bolunga ki aaj mai aapka add karunga to kal se badh jayegi ha lekin ye ek hafta hum aap aur mai milke monitor karenge to aapko dikhega ki inquiry flow achcha khasa badh raha hai.
Executive: Matlab aapko bhi dikhega ye sari cheeze.
Customer: Ha karo.
Executive: Theek hai is cheez me hai na baki sab hai na aapka aisa to nahi hai ki watches belt ye sari cheeze chahiye na sab ka chalega na aapka koi fix to nahi hai na.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Hai na bag leather bag ye sabka sari sabki categories ka bhej raha hu aap mujhe sabka bata dijiyega sir.
Customer: Bhejo bhejo mujhe sari cheeze karo aur please wo cheeze karwao aur aap bhi connection me rehna warna mai ye band kar dunga account yaar aisa.
Executive: Nahi mai mai mai hi karunga sir mai hi karunga is.
Customer: Sahi to nahi hai na ye.
Executive: Theek hai nahi nahi bilkul to mai aapko categories bhej raha hu hai na sari cheezo ki aap mujhe wo tick karke bataiye fir mai add karke fir aapka ticket mai close karunga aur kya.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai tab aapse puchunga whatsapp pe theek hai okay.
Executive: Theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough inquiries.

- No manager is taking updates.

- Feels that IndiaMART is not working for him.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the inquiry details with the customer.

- Executive will share category photos on WhatsApp.

- Executive will add categories to the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will tick the categories and share.



Alert (If Any):

- escalation



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, trustseal, categories, whatsapp, update
